analyzed: ▁an o t tapp aṃ ▁appa hāya ▁arahatt appatt īti

original: Arahā sarāgo sadoso samoho samāno samakkho sapaḷāso saupāyāso sakilesoti?
analyzed: ▁arahā ▁sa rāg o ▁sa dos o ▁sam o ho ▁samān o ▁sa makkh o ▁sa pa ḷ ā so ▁sa u pāyās o ▁sa kiles oti

original: nanu arahā nirāgo niddoso nimmoho nimmāno nimmakkho nippaḷāso nirupāyāso nikkilesoti?
analyzed: ▁nanu ▁arahā ▁ni rāg o ▁nidd o so ▁ni m moh o ▁ni m mān o ▁ni m makkh o ▁ni ppa ḷ ā so ▁ni ru pāyās o ▁ni k kiles oti

original: nikkileso, no ca vata re vattabbe—
Tena hi atthi kiñci saṁyojanaṁ appahāya arahattappattīti.
